-e ---

# Reflexive & Interrogative Pronouns

𓅱 𓈙 𓂧 𓀁 question & 𓅱 𓈙 𓃀 𓀁 answer

Question particle 𓆵=‘?’ 𓆵=Ja? ¿𓊪𓏏𓂋𓆵 Whether... pote® ?

𓆵 Ja ⇔ 𓆳 Jahr (year) and gar

variations of the same or similar (reflexive) who(S):

|english|hieroglyphs|approximation|cognates|
|-------|-----------|-------------|--------|
who? what? | 𓊪 𓅱 |phoo / whou| who, wem, 𒀀𒉌 whon™
who? who -one | 𓊪 𓍢 |phoo / whou| who, wer, wessen, 𒀀𒈾 whon™
who / what | 𓊪 𓏏 𓂋|whother| ’what are’, welcher, wos, was
this, the| 𓊪 𓅮 𓄿 |whoδer | what, which, welcher, was, ob-der, who’er wer
this, which | 𓊪 𓅱 |whoun| whom, when, one, wo (bad German for ‘which‘)
that (yonder)| 𓊪 𓆑 |whosn| what
this, that| 𓊪 𓅱 𓇋 𓇋 |whouy| who [with ancient 𓊪 as kou: qui, quoi]
what? |𓐍 𓏮 |khie| que? qui? 𒆠𒄿?
who/ what ?| 𓅓 𓂟 |mwhoda| who? pro? what?
when|𓅯𓅯|swans?|quando? qwhen 𓍿𓈖𓌙𓅯 whence
where?|𓏏 𓈖 𓌙 𓅯|dontan| donde-quen
when|𓐍 𓆑 𓏏|qvnda| quando, cuando, whence, when-dann
when|𓍿𓈖𓌙𓅯 |cntan|cuando ^^ qvnda

the last words obviously related to
𓍿 𓈖 𓌙 𓅯 𓏌 𓅱 𓏜 count, quantity Numbers

dialectic

There is an astonishing consistency in the dialectic of signs, almost as if the writing gave rise to multiple spoken languages:

𒀀 AQUA ⇔ 𓐍 𓏮 QUA-… 𐍈… / ѥi? / 𓋴? / ge? / que? / qui? / qwer? (gehts gut?) / quand? κατά 𓐍𓏏𓆑? 𓇋𓆵𓇳
𒀀 Wasser ⇔ 𐍈 W… وقت 𓊪𓅮 what 𓊪𓅱 who 𓇋𓅱 wer wie wo wann warum was wasser? 𓊪𓏏𓂋 !?! ⇔ Wahrheit 𓇋𓍱𓈙𓋴𓏏? ist>echt?
𒀀 Marin ⇔ 马 MA 𓅓𓂝 مَن … (modality pronoun prefix / suffix ) ⇔ Maat
𒀀 Sea 𓋴 see? 𓊄𓇋𓇋 shuǐ 水 ⇔ shuí 谁 (sic)

𓅯𓅯 query inquiry pronoun prefixes 𐍈 ⋍ 𒆪

Assuming as axiom a similarity between 𓅮 opthe and opter(fly) and between 𓆑ƒn/sn and phython.

Whether Petrus* brings watery weather?
*Pater Petairus 𓊪𓏏𓇯 DioPiter 𓏙𓏚 Jupiter ♃ - Skygod - Vater of Gods (now solely a planet)

𒀀𒊏𒍪 ᵛa-rá-zu Frage ⇔ savoir survey search

𓆓𓂧 discuss / qais / quoth / quest / quatschen / 𐌵𐌹𐍃𐍃 / quiz / ϩⲓⲱⲓϣ /qiz / 𐌵𐌹𐍃𐍃 / 𐌵𐌹𐌸𐌰𐌽
